attributes.action: grant elderly veterans living abroad the same rights as those living within the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Elderly veterans living abroad, even within the richer countries of the European Community, are allowed none of the UK based allowances for the elderly from heating to reduced prices on prescriptions to insulating their homes. Some exist on a basic UK or military pension which has reduced so much recently, due to the exchange rate, that they may be living in poverty. The only allowance that they may be entitled to is a grant for being buried, but how do they apply for that?
